text: Badge of HMCS Ontario HMCS Ontario can refer to several ships: * , a sixth- rate warship of the Provincial Marine (of then British North American Province of Quebec) and operated by the Royal Navy in Lake Ontario; sunk 1780 * , a cruiser transferred to the Royal Canadian Navy in 1944 and scrapped in 1960 * HMCS Ontario, a Royal Canadian Sea Cadet summer training centre in Kingston, Ontario established in 1977 as Cadets Camp Frontenac and now based at CFB Kingston/Royal Military College of Canada * HMCS Ontario was a planned nuclear-powered cancelled in 1989 ==See also== * Ontario (disambiguation) * * Category:Royal Canadian Navy ship names
title: HMCS Ontario
